definition: in sports, the act of enabling another player to make a good play, to act as an assistant in a subordinate or supportive function
details:
noun
- in sports, the act of enabling another player to make a good play
= example: in sports, the act of enabling another player to make a good play
- the activity of contributing to the fulfillment of a need or furtherance of an effort or purpose
= example: the activity of contributing to the fulfillment of a need or furtherance of an effort or purpose
= synonyms: aid, assistance, help
verb
- to act as an assistant in a subordinate or supportive function
= example: to act as an assistant in a subordinate or supportive function
- to work for or be a servant to
= example: to work for or be a servant to
= synonyms: serve, attend to, attend, wait on
- to give help to
= example: to give help to
= synonyms: aid, help
